attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Legislation is needed in order ensure that those who are currently claiming jobseekers allowance, and who are responsible for payments to parents that are maintaining a mortgage on a family home, can have these payments taken into account when applying for state help. In the current system, payments paid to friends or family are not taken into account when assessment of your financial is made. Often, the same amount of money if paid to a landlord will be factored in, and assistance will be provided to meet this payment.
attributes.creator_name: Ms. Erica Lloyd (BA Mus (Hons)., PGCE, QTS)
